scripts.clean:temp: vrs clean data work target log -force
scripts.reset:all: vrs clean data work target log upload -force && npm run build && npm run import
scripts.reset: npm run clean:temp && npm run build && npm run import
scripts.build:full.clean: npm run clean:temp && npm run build
scripts.build:release: npm run reset:all && npm run build:generated && npm run zip:source && npm run zip:update && npm run zip:release
scripts.release: npm run build:full.clean && vrs import && npm run build:release
